    display: block; }

      width: 100%;

      border-radius: 4px 4px 0 0;
      background-size: cover;
      background-repeat: no-repeat;
      background-position: center; }
    .BigNews .List-items-row .smallLowerBig {
      margin-top: 0;
      margin-bottom: 20px;
      border-top: 4px solid #A70808;
      border-radius: 0 0 4px 4px;
      padding: 10px 0;
      box-sizing: border-box; }

      text-transform: uppercase;
      color: #A70808;
      font-size: 12px;
      margin: 0 0 5px 0;
      font-weight: 800; }

      color: #000;
      font-weight: 800;

      margin: 0 0 5px 0; }

      margin: 5px 0;

  position: relative; }

h2.Contest.Page-actions-heading {
  display: none; }

.ArticlePage .ArticlePage-actions .ArticlePage-actions-heading, .ArticlePage .ArticlePage-actions .LongformPage-actions-heading, .Longform.Page-actions .ArticlePage-actions-heading, .Longform.Page-actions .LongformPage-actions-heading, .Contest.Page-actions-body .ArticlePage-actions-heading, .Contest.Page-actions-body .LongformPage-actions-heading {
  display: none; }

.ArticlePage .ArticlePage-actions .ActionBar-items, .Longform.Page-actions .ActionBar-items, .Contest.Page-actions-body .ActionBar-items {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  border-radius: 4px; }

.ArticlePage .ArticlePage-actions .ActionBar-items-item, .Longform.Page-actions .ActionBar-items-item, .Contest.Page-actions-body .ActionBar-items-item {
  list-style: none;
  display: inline-block; }
  .ArticlePage .ArticlePage-actions .ActionBar-items-item a, .Longform.Page-actions .ActionBar-items-item a, .Contest.Page-actions-body .ActionBar-items-item a {
    visibility: hidden;
    font-size: 0px;
    text-decoration: none;
    display: block; }
  .ArticlePage .ArticlePage-actions .ActionBar-items-item .TwitterTweetButton::before, .ArticlePage .ArticlePage-actions .ActionBar-items-item .FacebookShareButton::before, .ArticlePage .ArticlePage-actions .ActionBar-items-item .MailToLink::before, .Longform.Page-actions .ActionBar-items-item .TwitterTweetButton::before, .Longform.Page-actions .ActionBar-items-item .FacebookShareButton::before, .Longform.Page-actions .ActionBar-items-item .MailToLink::before, .Contest.Page-actions-body .ActionBar-items-item .TwitterTweetButton::before, .Contest.Page-actions-body .ActionBar-items-item .FacebookShareButton::before, .Contest.Page-actions-body .ActionBar-items-item .MailToLink::before {
    display: block;
    font-family: "Font Awesome 5 Brands";
    font-size: 26px;
    border-radius: 4px;
    padding: 8px 15px 8px 0;
    cursor: pointer;
    visibility: visible;
    text-rendering: auto;
    -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
    -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
    -webkit-perspective: 1000; }
  .ArticlePage .ArticlePage-actions .ActionBar-items-item .TwitterTweetButton::before, .Longform.Page-actions .ActionBar-items-item .TwitterTweetButton::before, .Contest.Page-actions-body .ActionBar-items-item .TwitterTweetButton::before {
    content: "\f099";
    color: #1DA1F2; }
  .ArticlePage .ArticlePage-actions .ActionBar-items-item .FacebookShareButton::before, .Longform.Page-actions .ActionBar-items-item .FacebookShareButton::before, .Contest.Page-actions-body .ActionBar-items-item .FacebookShareButton::before {
    content: "\f09a";
    color: #3B5998; }
  .ArticlePage .ArticlePage-actions .ActionBar-items-item .MailToLink::before, .Longform.Page-actions .ActionBar-items-item .MailToLink::before, .Contest.Page-actions-body .ActionBar-items-item .MailToLink::before {
    content: "\f0e0";
    color: #4e4e4e;
    font-family: "Font Awesome 5 Free";
    font-weight: 900; }

      padding-bottom: 0; }
    .modal-gallery .gallery-ad-728x90 .ad--728x90 {
      width: 45.5rem;
      height: 5.625rem;
      margin-left: auto;
      margin-right: auto;
      z-index: 20;
      margin-top: 12px;
      margin-bottom: 0; }

    position: absolute;
    right: 0;
    top: 52px;
    width: 330px;
    padding: 15px;
    bottom: 0;
    background: #fff;
    z-index: 999999;

      margin-bottom: 15px;
      display: block; }
    .modal-gallery #rightBar .gallery-caption {
      display: none;
      clear: both;

      font-size: 14px; }

        .modal-gallery #rightBar .gallery-caption.current.active {
          display: none; }

    color: #A70808;

    padding: 10px 15px; }
    .live-counts a:hover {
      color: #005687; }

    content: "\f0e7";

    padding-right: 4px; }

    padding-right: 4px; }

    display: block;

    width: auto;

    margin: 0; }
    .Wheel .WheelItem-wheelItems .PlaylistItem-title {
      display: none; }
